mapper.select: select a.stu_cd,final_marks,final_score,name,COL_NAME_FUNC(a.stu_cd) as col_name,MAJOR_NAME_FUNC(a.stu_cd) as major_name from lec a, student b where a.lec_cd=#{lecCd} and a.stu_cd=b.stu_cd and mylec_status_cd = 's' order by name
select a.stu_cd,sum(score*eval_rate*0.01) as ass_Score from ass_submit a,assignment b where a.ass_bno=b.ass_bno and a.lec_cd =#{LecCd} group by a.stu_cd order by a.stu_cd
select stu_cd,attend_status_cd,count(*) as attend_count from attend where lec_cd =#{LecCd} group by stu_cd,attend_status_cd order by lec_cd
select stu_cd,score as mid_Score from exam_apply where exam_seq in (select exam_seq from exam where exam_div_cd='mid' and lec_cd =#{LecCd}) order by stu_cd
select stu_cd,score as fin_Score from exam_apply where exam_seq in (select exam_seq from exam where exam_div_cd='fin' and lec_cd =#{LecCd}) order by stu_cd

select e.STU_CD ,e.LEC_CD ,e.SCORE as mid_score ,e.EXAM_SEQ from exam_apply e where e.stu_cd = #{stuCd} and e.lec_Cd = #{lecCd} and e.exam_seq = (select exam_seq from exam where exam_div_Cd = 'mid' and lec_cd = #{lecCd})
mapper.insert: insert into exam_apply (STU_CD,LEC_CD,SCORE,EXAM_SEQ) values (#{stuCd},#{lecCd} ,#{midScore},(select exam_seq from exam where exam_div_Cd = 'mid' and lec_cd = #{lecCd} ))
insert into exam_apply (STU_CD,LEC_CD,SCORE,EXAM_SEQ) values (#{stuCd},#{lecCd} ,#{finScore},(select exam_seq from exam where exam_div_Cd = 'fin' and lec_cd = #{lecCd} ))
